articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz completes dominant Madrid run with title over Alexander Zverev - ESPN
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz beat Alexander Zverev in straight sets on Sunday to win the Madrid Open and become the second-youngest player to win two Masters 1000 titles.
articles.content:
MADRID -- When Carlos Alcaraz played in his first Madrid Open as an 18-year-old, his goal was to gain experience and learn from the top players.
